articles.title: Second DPRK-US Military Working Contact Made
articles.content:
Second DPRK-US Military Working Contact Made
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- The second round of the DPRK-U.S. senior colonel-level military working contact for probing the truth about "Cheonan" case was made in Panmunjom on July 23.
					 The DPRK side confirmed the results of the U.S. forces side' examination of the issue of field investigation by the inspection group of the National Defence Commission which the DPRK side proposed at the last contact.
					
					 The U.S. forces side only repeated its previous unjust assertion that the "Cheonan" case should be handled within the framework of the Armistice Agreement as it was "violation of the AA."
					
					 The DPRK side chided the U.S. forces side for its insincere attitude of talking about the "violation of AA" quite contrary to the DPRK's positive efforts for the objective and scientific clarification of the truth about the case.
					
					 As an agreement was already reached as regards necessary working procedural matters including the schedule and agenda of the general-level talks, the U.S. forces side should unconditionally accept the NDC's proposal for field investigation by its inspection group for the successful talks.
					
					 As the U.S. forces side expressed understanding at the last contact, the NDC inspection group's field investigation is prerequisite for the objective and scientific clarification of the truth.
					
					 Only when the NDC inspection group's field inspection takes place first, will it be possible to open the DPRK-U.S. military general-level talks according to the results of investigation conducted by both sides and discuss various issues helpful not only to the fair solution to the ship case but to the improvement of the north-south relations and peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 The U.S. forces side should show its sincerity for the solution to the case by agreeing with the field investigation by the NDC inspection group as early as possible.
					
					 If the "results of investigation" announced by the joint investigation team were objective and scientific as claimed by the U.S. forces side, there would be no reason for it to refuse to receive the inspection group.
					
					 At the contact, the DPRK side advanced the following specific proposal for the NDC inspection group's field investigation:
					
					 The NDC inspection group shall be made up of 20-30 members.
					
					 The period of investigation shall be 3-5 days or longer under a bilateral agreement.
					
					All possible means including field inspection, analysis of "evidence", hearing of testimonies, collection and study of data, etc. shall be used for the NDC inspection group's field investigation.
					
					The U.S. forces side shall provide data, objects and material evidence requested by the inspection group.
					
					The NDC inspection group shall make overland travel by vehicles of the DPRK side via Panmunjom.
					
					  The U.S. forces side should be responsible for all technical guarantees for field inspection including guide for the members of the inspection group, provision of conveniences and personal safety.
					
					 The DPRK side clarified that there is no reason for the U.S. forces side to refuse to accept the DPRK's most reasonable and fair and aboveboard proposal for clearing the domestic and foreign doubts and mistrust  in the above-said case and defusing the tension prevailing on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 In closing the DPRK side termed the projected U.S.-south Korea joint naval exercises and "Ulji Freedom Guardian" joint military exercises  targeted against the DPRK another military provocation diametrically running counter to the atmosphere of dialogue.
					
					 Accusing the U.S. of resorting to an anti-DPRK military adventure while talking about "negotiated settlement of the issue," the DPRK side declared this double-dealing attitude is a dangerous one of driving the situation on the Korean Peninsula to a war phase. 
					
					 The U.S. forces side would be seriously mistaken if it calculates it can browbeat the DPRK through large-scale war exercises.
					
					 It should immediately stop the anti-DPRK nuclear war racket which it kicked up under the pretext of the false case, though belatedly, if it truly respects the just demand of the international community and is interested in ensuring peace on the Korean Peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia.
					
					 Both sides agreed to hold the third round of the DPRK-U.S. senior colonel-level military working contact in Panmunjom around July 29.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Speeches at World Conference
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Speeches at World Conference 
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, made an address at the Third World Conference of Speakers of Parliament on July 20.
					 The chairman said that if each parliament is to fulfill its responsibility for shared wellbeing at present, it is important to enact laws and supervise their enforcement with attitude and stand as the genuine representative of the people, not by party interests and stratagem.
					
					 He expressed support for the stand of the International Parliamentary Union (IPU) that it is necessary to ensure closer ties between the IPU and the United Nations and thus increase the influence of MPs on the UN work, enhance its transparency and responsibility and put spurs to its reform.
					
					 The decisive guarantee for ensuring lasting peace and stability in the Korean Peninsula at present is to give top-priority respect to and thoroughly implement the north-south joint declaration, the supreme reunification programme of the nation, he said, and went on:
					
					 The present U.S. administration should not follow in the wake of the Bush administration, clearly understanding how its policy to isolate and stifle the DPRK by force went into total bankruptcy, but accept the DPRK's proposal for concluding a peace treaty at an early date and refrain from meddling in the affairs of the Korean nation and the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 Under the uplifted banner of independence, peace and friendship the DPRK will as ever develop the friendly and cooperative relations with all countries which respect the sovereignty of the DPRK and are friendly towards it, irrespective of differences in ideology and ism and system.
					
					 We will vigorously accelerate the building of an economic power in reliance on the solid foundation of the independent national economy and positively develop the economic cooperation with other countries on the principle of equality and reciprocity.
					
					 The Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK will make positive contributions to establishing a just and democratic international society fully representing the will of the absolute majority of the people in the world and thus fulfill its mission and duty as a full-fledged member of the IPU.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Meets Chinese FM
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Meets Chinese FM
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister of the DPRK Pak Ui Chun attending the ARF met and had a talk with his Chinese counterpart Yang Jiechi in Hanoi, on Thursday. 
					Saying that General Secretary Kim Jong Il's visit to China and historic meeting with President Hu Jintao were of significance in developing the relations between the two countries, Yang Jiechi declared that China would continue to strive to boost the relations of good neighborliness and friendship with the DPRK.

articles.title: Senior State Officials Visit Taegyedo Tideland
articles.content:
Senior State Officials Visit Taegyedo Tideland
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- Senior state officials, a chairperson of a friendly party and leading officials of the party, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions on Friday visited the Taegyedo Tideland completed as a grand monumental structure.
					 The visitors were briefed on the reclamation of the tideland before a huge map showing its panoramic view. Then they went round the tideland.
					
					 Feasting their eyes on the embankments extending across the sea and the vast tideland, they expressed deep admiration at the hard work done by the builders to successfully complete the reclamation project as big as the West Sea Barrage, weathering manifold difficulties.

articles.title: Inhabitants in Flood-stricken Areas Rescued
articles.content:
Inhabitants in Flood-stricken Areas Rescued 
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- 68 working people and children in Unsan of North Phyongan Province and Sinhung and Hamhung areas of South Hamgyong Province were miraculously rescued by helicopters from the serious flood that hit those areas in the afternoon of July 22.

articles.title: Torrential Rain Persists
articles.content:
Torrential Rain Persists
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- Torrential rain hit some areas of the DPRK on July 22 and 23 under the influence of low atmospheric pressure that moved southeast from the north of the West Sea of Korea.
					 According to information available from 21:00 of July 22 to 6:00 of July 23, torrential rain persisted in Kangwon Province and North and South Hwanghae Provinces.
					
					 Typical rainfall registered 124 mm in Ichon County from 21:00 of July 22 to 3:00 of July 23 while 107 mm in Kaesong, 79 mm in Paechon County and 52 mm in Pongchon County from 3:00 to 6:00 on July 23.

articles.title: Victory in War Observed
articles.content:
Victory in War Observed
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by war veterans here at the Central Hall of Workers on Friday to celebrate the 57th anniversary of the great victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Put on the stage were colorful numbers such as chorus "Song Devoted to Marshal Kim Il Sung", narrative and male small chorus "Song of National Defence", female folk solo and male chorus "Song of Mt. Maebong", male solo and chorus "Red Chol Pass".
					
					Performers sang high praises of President Kim Il Sung who performed exploits by winning victory in the war to shine long in the history and General Secretary Kim Jong Il who has led the anti-imperialist and anti-U.S. confrontation to victory, demonstrating the dignity and honor of the country with his Songun politics.
					
					 They also sang of the spirit of devotedly safeguarding the country, matchless popular heroism and revolutionary optimism displayed by the army and people of the DPRK while dedicating their youth and lives to the party and the leader, the country and its people during the war.

articles.title: Research Findings Conducive to Coal Output
articles.content:
Research Findings Conducive to Coal Output
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- Scientific researches for increased coal output has been intensified in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Researchers of the Branch Academy of Coal Science went to coal mines of the Sunchon Area Youth Coal Mining Complex and the Pukchang Area Coal Mining Complex to develop technologies suitable for their actual conditions and introduce them in production.
					
					 The Research Institute of Coal Mining has developed chain props to increase their supporting capacity more than ten times and raise the mining rate. 
					
					 Some coal mines, including the February 8 Jikdong Youth Coal Mine, have boosted coal output by 20 percent with chain props.
					
					 Scientists who went to the Kangdong Area Coal Mining Complex remodeled the tractor of 10-ton-capacity electric car to raise the traction rate 1.3 times.
					
					 The Coal-dressing Research Institute has built a new air coal-dressing process in the Sunchon Area Youth Coal Mining Complex and solved all the scientific and technological problems arising in its operation.
					
					 Scientists of other research institutes have invented a mass mining method and a new coal hewing method and developed such equipment as large-sized hydraulic crusher and a new model of hydraulic rock-drill.

articles.title: Recreated Opera Indicative of Bright Future of Juche Arts
articles.content:
Recreated Opera Indicative of Bright Future of Juche Arts
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has successfully recreated opera "Evgeni Onegin" based on Pushkin's novel and composed by Tchaikovsky.
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il called for performing famous works of the world along with classical works of the nation and entrusted the conservatory with the recreation of the opera.
					
					 The conservatory, under the guidance of Kim Jong Il, recreated the opera, which was created in Juche 47 (1958) in Korea, on a high level to suit the taste of the new century.
					
					 Students of the conservatory successfully perform the opera, fully displaying their talents.
					
					 Their performance based on unique and rich voice, fine acting and excellent stage art strikingly demonstrates the validity of the policy of the Workers' Party of Korea on training reserve artistes. 
					
					 After appreciating the opera, Russian musicians and other foreigners admired the opera recreated under the guidance of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Scene of Alleged "Cheonan" Explosion Confirmed to Be False
articles.content:
Scene of Alleged "Cheonan" Explosion Confirmed to Be False
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Media Verification Committee for Probe into the Truth behind the Case of Warship "Cheonan" grouping the Journalists Association and two other media organizations claimed on July 20 through media report that the puppet authorities fabricated the warship case.  
					 The organization cited various facts to prove that the scene of "Cheonan" explosion announced by the "joint investigation team" was false. 
					
					 Recalling that the team claimed the scene of the warship explosion was the place where the ship was after its bow was cut from the stern, that is, after the ship was sunk, the organization refuted this assertion, saying the actual scene of the alleged explosion was the place where the ship was before being broken into two pieces, that is, at least 400 meters away northwest of the stated place. 
					
					 Now that the scene of the explosion was confirmed to be false, the whole course of the search for the torpedo wreckage and its "salvage" conducted by the team lost its scientific ground, the organization charged. 
					
					 It urged the team to make a scientific clarification of whether it could be possible for the torpedo propelling body, a gas turbine room and the stern to be almost in the same place even though they remarkably differ in size and weight and might be different in the time of their movements under the sea before their salvage.
					
					 The confirmation of the wrong scene of explosion in the wake of the false statement about "water column", the concealment of damaged propeller, the lie about the design of torpedo, argument about the period in which the torpedo got rusty and the twisted results of analysis of adsorptive brought into bolder relief the falsity of the "results of investigation", concluded the organization.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization More Doubtful about Warship Case
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization More Doubtful about Warship Case
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Citizens' Solidarity for Democratic Society in a report on July 19 raised a new doubt about the case of warship sinking.
					 The organization said that the "Ministry of National Defense" organized a meeting on July 15 to brief civic organizations on the case of warship "Cheonan" only to make them more skeptical. 
					
					 When asked about the size of a submarine boat which allegedly intruded into the waters where the warship sank, the "Ministry of Defense" first said that it was 2.75 meters wide but later made correction that it was 3.5 meters in width, the organization said, accusing the ministry of its ambiguous remarks about the name of the submarine and its voyage the day the case occurred.
					
					 The military authorities and the "joint investigation team" branded the submarine which they said attacked the warship as of "yono" level manufactured in the DPRK. But such submarine is recorded as a product of other country in a prestigious world military yearbook, the organization clarified.
					
					 Noting that the military authorities have also failed to scientifically prove the adsorptive obtained from the wrecked torpedo, the organization held that if the aluminum oxides turned adsorptive, so must have done the component of explosive powder. 
					
					 What is all the more doubtful is that fluorescent lamps remained undamaged inside the warship despite the "explosion by torpedo", it noted.
					
					 The military authorities asserted that the propeller of the warship became bent by the inertia force following a sudden stop but such thing could not happen as the warship sailed at a low speed at that time, the organization pointed out, stressing that anybody can easily see that propeller became bent when it was given a turn to the opposite side.
					
					 The organization declared that it would send its report and photographs to media and the "National Assembly" for verification.

articles.title: Puppet Prosecution's Wrong Action Slammed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Puppet Prosecution's Wrong Action Slammed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress in south Korea called a press conference in Seoul on July 19 to condemn the puppet prosecution for having groundlessly requested warrants of arrest.
					 In a press release the organization disclosed that the second request for warrants of arrest of Choe Yong Ok, vice-chairperson of its Committee for Independent Reunification, and Jong Tae Yon, ex-chairman of its Policy-making Committee, made by the prosecution on unreasonable charges, was turned down again that day. 
					
					 It said that such actions as over-issue of arrest warrants and infliction of menace and pain on the people by the prosecution are a mode of rule used in the period of the fascist dictatorship. 
					
					 Charging that the prosecution seeks to violate human rights and trample down the movement for independence, democracy and reunification through groundless accusation, the organization warned that the prosecution would surely be forced to pay for all the outrages it is committing everyday as they are clearly recorded.

articles.title: US Urged to Conclude Peace Treaty with DPRK
articles.content:
US Urged to Conclude Peace Treaty with DPRK
Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- Riyad Chaloub, chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, issued a statement on July 16 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 This year sees the lapse of 60 years after the outbreak of the Korean War, the statement noted, and said:
					
					 The U.S., which boasted of being the "strongest" in the world as it suffered not a single defeat in more than 110 wars of aggression it fought, hurled into the Korean War one third of its ground forces, one fifth of air force and most of the Pacific fleet and troops of 15 satellite countries as well as the south Korean puppet army and remnants of the Imperial Japanese Army. And it used even chemical and germ weapons without hesitation to kill many Koreans.
					
					 But it sustained a crushing defeat for the first time in its history by President Kim Il Sung's unique military idea and superb strategy and tactics, and could not but kneel down before the Korean people and sign the Armistice Agreement on July 27, 1953.
					
					 The U.S. has constantly escalated the tension on the Korean Peninsula for the past decades. A particular mention should be made of the fact that it introduced nuclear weapons into south Korea and instigated the south Korean authorities to build concrete wall in the area south of the Military Demarcation Line with an aim to keep Korea divided into the north and the south for an indefinite period.
					
					 We vehemently reject the U.S. forces' presence in south Korea and the puppet government's separatist moves so as to ensure peace on the peninsula.
					
					 We strongly urge the U.S. to withdraw its armed forces from south Korea at once and unconditionally respond to the DPRK's proposal for concluding a peace treaty.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Off Press in Venezuela
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Off Press in Venezuela
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Step Up Socialist Construction under the Banner of the Juche Idea" was brought out in e-book by the Venezuelan National Society for the Study of the Juche Idea on July 15. 
					 Expounded in the work, published on September 9, Juche 67 (1978), are the ultimate goal of the DPRK government, which is to model the whole of society on the Juche idea, and the tasks and ways to push ahead with the three revolutions.
					
					 The work also deals with such problems as thoroughly smashing the "two Koreas" plot of the separatists at home and abroad.

articles.title: EE.UU. debe aceptar propuesta de RPDC, senala Riyad Chaloub
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok hace uso de la palabra en la CMPP
Pyongyang, 23 de julio (ATCC) -- El dia 20, el presidente de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea (RPDC), Choe Thae Bok, pronuncio un discurso en la III Conferencia Mundial de los Presidentes de los Parlamentos (CMPP).
					Choe insistio en que en la actualidad para un parlamento, que asume la responsabilidad de fomentar el bienestar comun, es importante establecer la ley y supervisar el proceso de su ejecucion no por el interes y la estrategia de cada partido sino en la actitud y la posicion de verdaderos representantes del pueblo.
					
					Expreso el apoyo a la posicion de la Union Interparlamentaria (UI) de aumentar la influencia de los parlamentarios sobre las labores de la ONU mediante las estrechas relaciones entre estas dos organizaciones internacionales, consolidar la transparencia y la responsabilidad de la ONU y dar acicates a la reforma de la ONU.
					
					Hoy dia, la garantia decisiva para preservar la paz duradera y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana reside en respetar antes que nada la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur, maximo programa de la reunificacion nacional, y ejecutarla cabalmente, subrayo y prosiguio:
					
					La actual administracion norteamericana debe aceptar cuanto antes nuestra propuesta de aprobar un convenio de paz y dejar de intervenir en los problemas de la nacion coreana y en las relaciones intercoreanas, dandose clara cuenta de como quedo fracasada la politica de la administracion Bush que pretendia aislar y atropellar con la fuerza a la RPDC. 
					
					Tambien en el futuro, la RPDC enarbolara la bandera de la independencia, la paz y la amistad y desarrollara las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con todos los paises del mundo que respetan nuestra soberania y nos tratan con amistad, por encima de las diferencias de ideas, ideales y regimenes.
					
					Aceleraremos vigorosamente la construccion de la potencia economica basandonos en el firme cimiento de la economia nacional independiente y desarrollaremos activamente las relaciones de cooperacion economica con otros paises en los principios de igualdad y de beneficio mutuo.
					
					La APS de la RPDC contribuira con teson a establecer la sociedad internacional justa y democratica capaz de abogar suficientemente por la voluntad de la mayoria absoluta de los pueblos de nuestro planeta y cumplira con su mision y obligacion como digno miembro de la UI.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok hace uso de la palabra en la CMPP
articles.content:
Se movilizan aviones para salvar a habitantes de zonas inundadas
						
Pyongyang, 23 de julio (ATCC) -- Fueron salvados por varios aviones los 68 trabajadores y ninos que se encontraban ante el dilema de vida o muerte por  la inundacion creada inesperadamente el dia 22 por la tarde en Unsan de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte y las zonas de Sinhung y Hamhung de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur.
					  A consecuencia de la depresion atmosferica que pasaba entre los dias 21 y 22 por la zona septentrional de Corea cayo la lluvia torrencial en muchas partes del pais, que causo grandes danos en varias localidades.
					
					   En particular, en el distrito de Unsan cayeron la lluvia de 204mm durante 39 horas desde la 0 del dia 21 hasta las 15 del 22 y, en particular, 79mm durante 3 horas desde las 3 hasta las 6 de la madrugada del mismo dia, mayor cantidad a escala nacional, debido a lo cual todo el distrito empezo a sumergirse en el agua.
					
					  Cerca de mil hectareas de la tierra cultivable fueron inundadas y 40 obreros quedaron aislados dentro de colinas rodeadas por el agua.
					
					  Tambien, en las zonas de Sinhung, Hamhung y Yonggwang cayo la lluvia de 137mm y de 112 mm durante los dos dias mismos creando la situacion critica de inundacion.
					
					  Por la inundacion de repente del rio Songchon, los 9 obreros de la mina y 10 granjeros y ninos del distrito de Yonggwang fueron aislados en un islote situado en medio del rio.
					
					  Ademas, en un islote del rio Songchon en la comuna de Pumin, los 9 campesinos de la Granja Cooperativa homonima estaban en la misma situacion.
					
					  Al enterarse de tal noticia, el Dirigente           Kim Jong Il, dio la orden de movilizacion rapida a una unidad aerea del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					  Por eso, los 4 aviones volaron hacia las zonas inundadas.
					
					  Pese a las condiciones desfavorables, los aviadores llegados a Sinhung y Hamhung trasladaron a los 28 habitantes en total al lugar seguro en cooperacion con los funcionarios de la Direccion de Seguridad del Pueblo de la Provincia de Hamgyong del  Sur y la Estacion de Seguridad del Pueblo de la Ciudad de Hamhung.
					
					  Otros oficiales y pilotos movilizados pusieron de manifiesto el espiritu de sacrificio para una mujer y dos ninos que no subieron al avion en la damnificada comuna de Pumin.
					
					  Y los aviadores, que desarrollaron la operacion de socorro en el distrito de Unsan, salvaron sin riesgo a todas las 40 personas.

articles.title: Se movilizan aviones para salvar a habitantes de zonas inundadas
articles.content:
Lluvia torrencial en Corea
Pyongyang, 23 de julio (ATCC) -- A consecuencia de la influencia de la alta presion atmosferica subtropical del Noroeste Pacifico y la depresion atmosferica trasladada desde la parte septentrional del Mar Oeste de Corea hasta la zona septentrional cayo otra vez la lluvia torrencial en varias localidades de Corea.
					  Segun los datos recogidos desde la 0 del dia 21 hasta las 21 del 22, las precipitaciones fueron registradas mas de 200mm en el distrito de Unsan de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte y el distrito de Songwon de la provincia de Jagang y mas de 180mm en el distrito de Singye de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte, el distrito de Ryongrim de la provincia de Jagang, el distrito de Phangyo de la provincia de Kangwon y la zona de Yodok de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur.
					
					  Ademas, cayo la lluvia copiosa en casi 50 partes, entre ellas, la ciudad de Huichon de la provincia de Jagang, los distritos de Pukchang y Maengsan de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur, el distrito de Thaechon de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, el distrito de Poptong de la provincia de Kangwon y los distritos de Yonggwang y Hamju de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur.

articles.title: Entidad surcoreana presenta nueva sospecha sobre caso del "Cheonan"
articles.content:
Entidad surcoreana presenta nueva sospecha sobre caso del "Cheonan"
Pyongyang, 23 de julio (ATCC) -- La Participacion Solidaria de Ciudadanos por la Sociedad Democratica del Sur de Corea, en su informe publicado el dia 19, presento una nueva sospecha sobre el incidente del hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan".
					El "Ministerio de Defensa Nacional" concedio el dia 15 un cenaculo de explicacion sobre el caso del "Cheonan" para las entidades civiles, pero esto produjo mucho mas dudas, senala la nota y continua:
					
					A la pregunta sobre el tamano del supuesto submarino infiltrado en la zona maritima del hundimiento del "Cheonan", el "Ministerio de Defensa Nacional" respondio que tenia 2.75 metros de ancho y luego lo corrigio como 3.5 metros.
					
					Ademas, solto las palabras contradictorias en cuanto al nombre de ese submarino y a la ruta de navegacion en el dia del incidente. 
					
					Segun las autoridades militares y el "grupo de investigacion conjunta", el submarino que ataco el buque "Cheonan" era de nivel de "yono" construido en la RPDC. Pero, lo nego un anuario militar mundial prestigioso.
					
					Las autoridades militares no comprobaron de manera cientifica las sustancias adsorbidas de restos del torpedo. 
					
					Si fuera absorbido el oxido de aluminio, tambien habrian sido absorbidos los elementos de la dinamita.
					
					Lo mas sospechoso es la lampara fluorescente que se mantiene intacta en el interior del buque pese a la supuesta "explosion del torpedo".
					
					Ademas, las autoridades militares insistieron en que el arqueo de la helice se debio a la inercia por la parada repentina. Pero, no se puede ocurrir este fenomeno porque en aquel entonces el buque navegaba a baja velocidad. 
					
					Pues, no cabe duda de que la helice fue arqueada por la rotacion inversa, refuta la nota.
					
					Por ultimo, apunta que enviaria ese informe y las fotos al circulo de prensa y a la "Asamblea Nacional" para revisarlos.
